summary.span: 表示基于哈希的消息验证代码 (HMAC) 的所有实现必须从中派生的抽象类。

span.span: Represents the abstract class from which all implementations of Hash-based Message Authentication Code (HMAC) must derive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 基于哈希的消息身份验证代码 (HMAC) 可以用于确定是否通过不安全通道发送的消息已被篡改，前提是在发送方和接收方共享机密密钥。A Hash-based Message Authentication Code (HMAC) can be used to determine whether a message sent over an insecure channel has been tampered with, provided that the sender and receiver share a secret key. 发件人计算原始数据的哈希值，并将原始数据和 HMAC 传送一条消息。The sender computes the hash value for the original data and sends both the original data and the HMAC as a single message. 接收方重新计算对收到的消息哈希值，并检查计算哈希值与传输的哈希值相匹配。The receiver recomputes the hash value on the received message and checks that the computed hash value matches the transmitted hash value. HMAC 可以用于任何迭代的加密哈希函数，例如 MD5 或 SHA-1，与共享密钥结合使用。HMAC can be used with any iterative cryptographic hash function, such as MD5 or SHA-1, in combination with a secret shared key. HMAC 的加密强度取决于基础的哈希函数的属性。The cryptographic strength of HMAC depends on the properties of the underlying hash function. 对数据或哈希值进行任何更改会导致不匹配，因为更改消息和重新生成的正确哈希值需要机密密钥。Any change to the data or the hash value results in a mismatch, because knowledge of the secret key is required to change the message and reproduce the correct hash value. 因此，如果原始和计算所得的哈希值匹配，该消息进行身份验证。Therefore, if the original and computed hash values match, the message is authenticated.
